TopicTitle: Planet mod that adds a good looking kerbin-like?

Articles.Content:
Hello guys, I like planets that look like kerbin, I have tried many mods and I haven't been able to find any kerbin-like planet, do you guys know of any? cheers.

Edited August 26, 2015 by eirexe

Most of these mods that add planets need Kopernicus, found here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114649

so download that first. As for mods that create it, you would have to request somebody to make an EXTENSION to Kopernicus. Just clarifying.
